document_data.mainbody:
The Tantras Trail, also called the Lions Walk, was a trail that ran through the Vast, connecting the city of Tantras and the village of Highbank Forest.
From west to east, it began at Tantras, ran through Orlimmin, and ended at Highbank Forest. On the way, it linked with the Cross Road, Coast Road, the Long Reach, and Feldars Trail.
